scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run server

devDependencies-comments.copy-webpack-plugin: Allows webpack to copy files from public/ to dist/.
devDependencies-comments.http-server: An http server to host the site. Used as the dev server.
devDependencies-comments.ts-loader: Allows webpack to load ts files.
devDependencies-comments.webpack: Bundles scripts into one file and generate dist/.

dependencies-comments.bluebird: Replaces native Promise in Cobalt because Cobalt doesn't support unhandledrejection natively.
